credit_line: Gift of Frank Jewett Mather, Jr., Class of 1889
title: Book of Hours
description: handwritten and illuminated on vellum, leather bound with silver metal hindges
inscriptions: first page u.l. in pencil: 4/24-YATLA; first page l.l. in pencil: 10; first page l.c. stamped in ink: BOUND BY BEXROSE, DERBY; first page u.l. in pencil: Circa  ~ 1450 [crossed out] 1420/30  LOAN 506/ Written on 190 leaves of vellum/ 4 large miniatures/ 12 small " (Zodiac)/ Troyes [underlined] use. Champagne style.; first page c. in ink: Frank Jewett Mather Jr./ Hours use of Troye 1420ca/ zodical signs and occupations
